cast.name: 霍拉丘·默勒埃莱 Horaţiu Mălăele
亚历山德鲁·波托赛昂 Alexandru Bindea
阿德里安·乔巴努 Adrian Ciobanu

director.name: 霍拉丘·默勒埃莱 Horaţiu Mălăele

introduction: In a peripheral neighborhood of Bucharest, immigrants drowning their sorrows in the pub Samir: "The immigrant happy." At one table, three friends have lost count of cups. They are: Lionel - a Romanian returned from France where he worked in construction, Kiril - a small-scale smuggler Bulgarian and Igor - a Russian without a residence in Romania, working illegally as a plumber. Squeeze the impending raid Sunday that makes Dove agent on the hour, the three quickly clears the bar with the other customers.I get next to a vacant lot where he installed a gypsy camp. Like to have fun, the three paid a gypsy to guess the future. This model predicts the exact date of death and how to die. Here starts the fun ...
